sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RECKLINGHAUSEN a city of the Prussian province fo Westphalia, in the government of Munster, and the capital of a circle of the same name, which extends over 265 square miles, and contains 38,300 inhabitants. The city contains two churches, a convent, 420 houses, and 2500 inhabitants, but has very little trade. Long. l 7. 4. 57. E. Lat. 51. 37. 25. N.
